overview:
Adam is the Chairman & Founder of imwave, inc, a leading performance search engine marketing agency. Imwave focuses primarily on building and launching effective pay-per-click search engine keyword marketing campaigns for companies paying commissions on sales and leads generated. In both 2009 & 2010 imwave was recognized as one of the fastest growing privately held companies by Inc. Magazine. Imwave recently announced they had served over 4 Billion ads for their clients!

Adam, a serial internet entrepreneur, founded one of the first commercial internet service providers (ISPs) in 1993. He has a deep understanding of internet technologies and profitable internet marketing tactics. Adam currently sites on the publisher advisory boards for Commission Junction and the Google Affiliate Network.
